title: The Road Home
description:
The ruggedly charming mechanic falls for the town’s sweet kindergarten teacher.Sounds like a fairytale, right? Except Sadie already has a Prince Charming. And he’s a prick.So I've been friend-zoned, resigned to watching the woman of my dreams with another man.Until the night I discovered the secret Sadie Miller had been keeping—one that will likely get me arrested.Without a second thought, I move her in with me.I become her protector, friend, roommate—whatever she needs. And she definitely doesn’t need her new roommate making a move on her.Even if I’ve loved her for years.Even if she’s living in my house, wearing my shirts, using my shower.I’ve hidden my feelings for this long, how hard could it be to hide them a bit longer?Apparently… hard as hell.___________The Road Home is a steamy, heartfelt, swoony, friends-to-roommates-to-lovers standalone small town romance in the interconnected Landry Love Series.
Author Note: This book contains scenes that refer to past domestic abuse/violence situations.
author: Amy Alves
